name: Slider Glider
description:
A simple game where the objective is to avoid all blocks by moving the player left and right, this game is under development so there's a lot of features missing. If you find any bugs while playing, please let me know about them that way I can fix them.

This game is inspired by Brackeys tutorial on how to make a game, so the game itself is not my idea. Though I tried to build on the game and make it more interesting, enjoy!
